item.title: Bandos boots Model + Ints
item.dc:creator: @King_Redrum King Redrum
item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

Class8.java code:

if(i == 7638){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; class8.anInt174 = 13422;//item look class8.anInt181 = 724; class8.anInt190 = 171; class8.anInt198 = 2039; class8.anInt204 = 144; class8.anInt169 = 3; class8.anInt194 = 3; class8.anInt165 = 13423; class8.anInt200 = 19951; class8.anInt175 = 28259; class8.anInt197 = 28260; class8.aString170 = "Bandos boots"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A nice set of Bandos boots, worn once by the god Bandos.".getBytes(); }

Item.cfg code.

item = 7638	Bandos_Boots	A nice set of Bandos boots, worn once by the god Bandos.	122000000	122000000	122000000	0	0	0	-6	-2	21	22	23	0	0	6	0

And the links for the two models:
http://uppit.com/UZ6U48
http://uppit.com/AY5LSM

Remember, on the item.cfg code, when putting it in do this:

item[space]=[space]7638[tab]Bandos_Boots[tab]A_nice_set_of_Bandos_boots,_worn_once_by_the_god_Bandos.[tab]122000000[tab]122000000[tab]122000000[tab]0[tab]0[tab]0[tab]-6[tab]-2[tab]21[tab]22[tab]23[tab]0[tab]0[tab]6[tab]0

Where it says [space] put a space (hit the space bar) and where it says [tab] hit the tab button.

Also don’t forget once you add the models in-game, make sure to do
Add Model 13422
Add Model 13423

And then in your item.java file make sure to add the boots ID to the boots part.

Hope it works and hope it helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Bandos boots Model + Ints
item.dc:creator: @faded_vision Faded Vision
item.description:
@faded_vision wrote:

Got it Guys, thanks to kingReddrum

Class8.java code:

[code]if(i == 7638){
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0;
class8.anInt174 = 13422;//item look
class8.anInt181 = 724;
class8.anInt190 = 171;
class8.anInt198 = 2039;
class8.anInt204 = 144;
class8.anInt169 = 3;
class8.anInt194 = 3;
class8.anInt165 = 13423;
class8.anInt200 = 19951;
class8.anInt175 = 28259;
class8.anInt197 = 28260;
class8.aString170 = “Bandos boots”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “A nice set of Bandos boots, worn once by the god Bandos.”.getBytes();
}

[/code]
Item.cfg code.

item = 7638 Bandos_Boots A nice set of Bandos boots, worn once by the god Bandos. 122000000 122000000 122000000 0 0 0 -6 -2 21 22 23 0 0 6 0

And the links for the two models:
http://uppit.com/UZ6U48
http://uppit.com/AY5LSM

Remember, on the item.cfg code, when putting it in do this:
Code:

item[space]=[space]7638[tab]Bandos_Boots[tab]A_nice_set_of_Bandos_boots,_worn_once_by_the_god_Bandos.[tab]122000000[tab]122000000[tab]122000000[tab]0[tab]0[tab]0[tab]-6[tab]-2[tab]21[tab]22[tab]23[tab]0[tab]0[tab]6[tab]0

Where it says [space] put a space (hit the space bar) and where it says [tab] hit the tab button.

Also don’t forget once you add the models in-game, make sure to do
Add Model 13422
Add Model 13423

And then in your item.java file make sure to add the boots ID to the boots part.

Hope it works and hope it helped.

Read full topic
